titles.wordSelection: Parameters will apply to exercises created from these {{amountWordsSelectedForExercises}} words:
titles.tryDifferentSettings: Please try again with different settings.

tooltips.needMorePractice: I don't know this, show me again!
tooltips.performanceExplain: Your performance on this word. Last time you practiced this: {{lastDate}}
tooltips.typeExerciseExplain: This will determine the type of card to be displayed
tooltips.typeCardExplain: This will determine the amount of languages that will be part of the exercises displayed in an exercise card
tooltips.requireMultipleChoice: Exercise type must be 'Multiple-Choice' or 'Random' to change this value
tooltips.requireTextInput: Exercise type must be 'Text-Input' or 'Random' to change this value
tooltips.sortingAndSelectionExplain: This determines how we select the exercises to display. With 'Exercise-Performance' we prioritize words and translations you haven't practiced yet.
tooltips.nativeLanguageParameterExplain: This determines if we include exercises related to your native language in the case of single-language exercises.

validation.minAmountSelection: You must select at least one item

difficultyMC.textLevel3: Same word - same language - different cases

difficultyTI.textLevel3: Zero tolerance - input must match exactly.
